name: HOTFIX (Lucas Kauff)
description:
PITCH

- HOTFIX is a game in which the player embodies a QA Tester who must test a buggy game that is updating during his game session.

- He will have to complete quests that change every few seconds depending on the patches that arrive in the game.

- The challenge is based on the frequent and cyclical change in the nature of its quests.

RULES

- If you complete 5 quests, you win the game.

- If you miss 5, you lose.

CONTROLS

- HOTFIX is to be played with mouse and keyboard.

- Play with sound if possible ;)

TEAM

Antoine MACHINET - Eliott MORET - Kilian ALLAIRE - Maxence DROZ - Lucas KAUFF
